Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தன்னுயிர் தான்அறப் பெற்றானை ஏனையமன்னுயி ரெல்லாந் தொழும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: All other creatures will worship him who has attained the control of his own soul.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A single, powerful ascetic is shown. They have achieved complete mastery over their own soul ('தன் உயிர் தான் அறப் பெற்றானை'). This is visualized as their soul being a perfectly calm, stable, and radiant sphere of light that they hold in their hands.
Layered_Composition.Midground: A vast assembly of all the other living beings in the world ('ஏனைய மன் உயிர் எல்லாம்') is gathered before them.
Layered_Composition.Background: Every single creature, from the mightiest elephant and lion to the smallest bird and insect, and all the people of the world, are shown bowing down in a unified act of worship ('தொழும்') towards the one who has achieved perfect self-mastery.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The person who has achieved perfect control over their own soul will be worshipped by all other living beings.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The soul as a perfect, controlled sphere of light is a symbol of their achievement. The universal act of worship by all creatures, predator and prey alike, shows the profound, peace-inducing power of their attainment.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Reverence, universal respect, supreme mastery, peace.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A brilliant, divine, golden light emanates from the mastered soul, bathing the entire scene in a sacred glow. The palette is one of worship and divine peace.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A low-angle, wide, epic shot from behind the worshipping creatures, looking up at the majestic, serene figure of the self-mastered ascetic.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a diverse and detailed depiction of all the worshipping creatures.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The mastered soul is the primary, divine light source.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Epic mythological painting, high fantasy art.
